cookingTips: Use only the lemon zest (yellow part) and avoid the white pith which is bitter
Infuse the zest in alcohol for 10-15 days in a cool, dark place before making the syrup
Store the finished limoncello in the freezer for the best serving temperature and consistency
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me understand the infusion and syrup-making process to create authentic Italian limoncello with bright lemon flavor.
